Title: Text, Lies and Videotape
Plot: Jen helps Dawson go to the shrink he ran away from last week. Dawson still thinks that the whole idea of sharing his thoughts with a complete stranger is weird, but he is surprised with how much he learns from it. Back home, he has to handle the problem with his father will, which does not include Lily. Meanwhile, Joey is working on a project about old love letters written by an obscure writer, and with the help of Audrey's audition tape for ""The Real World: Ibiza"", she manages to catch someth
GuestStars: Pauley Perrette, Gwendolyn Whiteside, Pam Hurley, Chris Childers, Gavin Gregory, Jason B. Horgan, Corie Berkemeyer, Robert Longstreet, Daniel Richani
